root.name: Titanion
root.description: GameplayTitanion resembles a 3-d version of Galaga, and the goal is similar (high-score) but in Titanion the player has the tractor beam. This allows the player to capture up to 10 enemy fighters to use against the other foes. There are three modes: modern, basic, and classic; the modes roughly correspond to difficulty levels (easy-hard). Upon completing a wave a layer is added to the tower behind the gameplay, which indicates what level the player is on. The difficulty increases exponentially until the player is out of lives.
